transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan ji Mr. Khan baat kar rahe hain Khan Enterprises se?
Customer: Haan ji se na yahi se baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Abhi meri baat hui thi na sir aapse?
Customer: Haan haan ab aap call kyun kar diya mam?
Executive: Sir maine call kata nahi tha network ki vajah se call disconnect hua tha aapko do baar to main already call kar chuki hu sir aapne abhi abhi just no diya hai WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Abhi matlab kyun kar diya isiliye call nahi kiya tha baat chit to nahi hua tha but mera jo main
Executive: Sir aap ek baat samajhne sir aap ek baat samajhne ki koshish kijiye aapse chhe saat minute baat hui hai usse pehle bhi maine aapko call kiya tha agar call disconnect hua to main uske baad aapko call karti ya fir aap call back same number pe kar sakte hain na sir.
Customer: Haan koi dikkat nahi but kya hai main to soch raha tha mam aap to koi bhi nahi to bataya jo kya uska product koi inactive hai to active kara dijiye mam.
Executive: Sir jab main dekhiye sir maine aapka ek ek product aapke sath discuss kiya aur aapko bataya agar aap online hai to main aapko fir se samjha deti hu aapka koi bhi product inactive nahi hai sir. Aapke jo product hai aapke gold medal detector product hai underground metal detector GR detect metal detector aur handheld metal detectors ye products hai sir aapke abhi maine aapko ye bhi bataya sir ki gold medal detector mein aapki primary product added hai GR detect metal detector mein aapke do product added hai but agar aap kehte hain main GR ko hata dungi lekin fir usse related aapko inquiries nahi aayengi agar aap agree karte hain to main hata deti hu isko.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi hatana chahiye.
Executive: Haan ji? Rakh dijiye rakh dijiye na rakh dijiye nahi hatao thik hai GR detected mera bhi related hai.
Executive: Sir main wohi bol rahi hu aur wohi cheez maine aap discuss kari thi aur usme kuch remaining bhi nahi raha tha sir aapne matlab abhi aapne purane WhatsApp chat pe gaye ho aur aapne no pehle abhi no share kiya hai sir call pe sir ye jo
Customer: Main main aap yes kar deta hu thik hai mam.
Executive: Sir aapki baat aapki bilkul thik hai sir aapki baat bilkul thik hai lekin aap ye bhi to samajhiye na sir aapke pass call back ka bhi option rehta hai hume aur hum sari cheeze to aapko matlab dete hi hai na sir dekho long root ki call hoti hai main aapko Noida se call kar rahi hu sir ab kai baar sir network bhi to issue ho jata hai na ki call detect ho jati hai panch chhe minute baad maine aapka phone kata nahi tha sir aapka phone disconnect hua tha.
Customer: Achha thik hai mam main feedback deta de deta hu thik hai koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir baki aapke pass mera direct number bhi hai aap usse call kar sakte ho aur aapka issue to maine usi call pe bhi resolve kar diya tha sir GR metal detector ke plus mein aapke product maine discuss bhi kiye the ki sir dekho aapke sare product active hai aapka koi bhi aapke 20 product hai aapke 20 ke 20 product active hai koi bhi not active product mein nahi hai sir aapka sare product aapke added hai thoda sa aap agar chahe to aap mujhe specification de sakte hain product ka kuch product hai jinme specification dala ja sakta hai to aap mujhe agar de denge to woh main product mein aapka specification dal deti hu sir.
Customer: Achha thik hai mam thik hai koi dikkat nahi main aapka yes aap likh ke bhej diya hu.
Executive: Sir haan aap sir thik hai sir aap matlab thoda sa samajhiye sir ye cheez me hamare liye bhi important hoti hai aapne pichli call ke feedback pe diya main abhi woh kar rahi hu abhi dobara se na sir ye ek concern jo hamare pass raise hua hai na iska ek feedback aapko aayega aap please sir request hai aapse usko yes mark kar dijiyega thik hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan haan mam satisfy kar deta hu thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai sir ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer thought some products were inactive.

- Call disconnected due to network issues.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed all products are active.

- Explained GR metal detector benefits.

- Offered to add product specifications if provided.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide product specifications.

- Customer will mark feedback as 'yes'.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product activation, network issue, product specification, feedback
